entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9 except minus 15 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9 except minus 15 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain showers near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
